titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the United States should resume normal diplomatic relations with Taiwan, and for other purposes.
Expressing the sense of Congress that the United States should resume normal diplomatic relations with Taiwan, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of Congress that the President should: (1) abandon the One China Policy in favor of a One China, One Taiwan Policy that recognizes Taiwan's independence; and (2) begin the process of resuming normal diplomatic relations with Taiwan.
